title: Dinnerbone: 正用Rust开发游戏
author: ff98sha
txt_content:

原文：Experimenting with Rust for game development. Piston looks pretty neat but I'm really finding the documentation lacking :(
译文：正尝试用Rust进行游戏开发。Piston看起来十分整洁，但我真的找到了教程的缺失:(
